AOTL

Saturday, Dec. 21st
5:00 PM
Zoe West

"All of the Lights" is about creating a space where comfort meets celebration, where every corner invites friendly conversations, and where the spirit of the season is found in shared laughter and warm greetings. Join us for an evening that celebrates the simple pleasure of good company and heartfelt connections. Warm your hands with steaming mugs of hot chocolate or coffee, enjoy some homemade Christmas treats, and get preoccupied with some activities planned for the evening like candlemaking, christmas decoration crafting and more. We are looking forward to having you there.

How you
can participate

And when death comes, like the falling night, remember the purpose that gave you flight. For you were made to make a mark, and leave behind a legacy bright and stark.
